column4: can someone give me a hand?  everything related to apt segfaults
no error messages...
where can I find a .deb for apt?
seriously, someone must know where to find a deb for apt, I need to get my system fixed
packages.ubuntu.com
then what?
then you find a .deb for every package in the ubuntu repositories
I'm having a difficult time finding a deb for it
sources, package lists, but no debs
it's at the bottom with ``download apt'' http://packages.ubuntu.com/breezy/base/apt
I don't see it
click on the architecture
ah, thanks
that's incredibly unclear
agreed, I didn't understand at first either
sigh, didn't help, apt still segfaults...
I probably won't be able to help with that, sounds very problematic... but we can bounce some ideas around.  Are you using breezy?  when did it start seg faulting?
I'm on dapper, and it started segfaulting... like 30 minutes ago... and I was using it pretty redily
did you make sure to download the deb for dapper?  I linked you to breezy
yes, I'm sure.
could check #ubuntu+1 and see if anyone else is having the problem
